00031 class Timer{
00032   timespec tv1,tv2;
00033 public:
00034   void start()  {clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tv1);}
00035   void stop()   {clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tv2);}
00036   void end()    {stop();}
00037   double time() {return(double(tv2.tv_sec - tv1.tv_sec) + double(tv2.tv_nsec - tv1.tv_nsec) * 1.0E-9);}
00038   double timeMSec() {return(time() * 1.0E3);}
00039   double timeUSec() {return(time() * 1.0E6);}
00040 
00041   double interval(){
00042     double t;
00043     clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tv2);
00044     t = time();
00045     tv1 = tv2;
00046     return(t);
00047   }
00048   double midtime() {
00049     timespec tmp;
00050     clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tmp);
00051     return(double(tmp.tv_sec - tv1.tv_sec) + double(tmp.tv_nsec - tv1.tv_nsec) * 1.0E-9);
00052   }
00053 };
00054 
00055 class AccumulativeTimer{
00056   timespec tv1,tv2;
00057   double total;
00058 public:
00059   AccumulativeTimer() {
00060     clear();
00061   }
00062   void clear() {
00063     total=0.0;
00064   }
00065   void start()  {clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tv1);}
00066   void stop()
00067   {
00068     clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tv2);
00069     total+=time();
00070   }
00071   double getTotal() {return total;}
00072   void end() {stop();}
00073   double time() {return(double(tv2.tv_sec - tv1.tv_sec) + double(tv2.tv_nsec - tv1.tv_nsec) * 1.0E-9);}
00074   double timeMSec() {return(time() * 1.0E3);}
00075   double timeUSec() {return(time() * 1.0E6);}
00076   
00077   double interval(){
00078     double t;
00079     clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tv2);
00080     t = time();
00081     tv1 = tv2;
00082     return(t);
00083   }
00084   double midtime() {
00085     timespec tmp;
00086     clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&tmp);
00087     return(double(tmp.tv_sec - tv1.tv_sec) + double(tmp.tv_nsec - tv1.tv_nsec) * 1.0E-9);
00088   }
00089 };
00090 
00091 inline unsigned GetTimeUSec()
00092 {
00093 #ifdef Apertos
00094   struct SystemTime time;
00095   GetSystemTime(&time);
00096   return(time.seconds*1000000 + time.useconds);
00097 #else
00098   timespec ts;
00099   clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME,&ts);
00100   return(double(ts.tv_sec)*1000000.0 + double(ts.tv_nsec)*(1.0E-3));
00101 #endif
00102 }
00103 
00104 inline double GetTimeSec()
00105 {
00106 #ifdef Apertos
00107   struct SystemTime time;
00108   GetSystemTime(&time);
00109   return((double)time.seconds + time.useconds*(1.0E-6));
00110 #else
00111   timespec ts;
00112   clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME,&ts);
00113   return(double(ts.tv_sec) + double(ts.tv_nsec)*(1.0E-9));
00114 #endif
00115 }
00116 
00117 inline double GetProcessTimeSec()
00118 {
00119   timespec ts;
00120   clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&ts);
00121   return(double(ts.tv_sec) + double(ts.tv_nsec)*(1.0E-9));  
00122 }
00123 
00124 inline void GetDate(struct tm &date)
00125 {
00126   time_t t = time(NULL);
00127   localtime_r(&t,&date);
00128 }
00129 
00130 inline void Sleep(double sec)
00131 {
00132   usleep((int)(sec * 1E6));
00133 }
00134 
00135 class FunctionTimer{
00136   const char *fname;
00137   double tStart, lapStart, tStop;
00138   int lapNum;
00139   double getTickCount()
00140   {
00141     timespec ts;
00142     clock_gettime(CLOCK_PROCESS_CPUTIME_ID,&ts);
00143     return(double(ts.tv_sec) + double(ts.tv_nsec)*(1.0E-9));
00144   }
00145 public:
00146   FunctionTimer(const char *_fname)
00147   {fname=_fname; tStart = lapStart = getTickCount(); lapNum = 0; tStop=0.0;}
00148   void Lap(int lineNum)
00149   {tStop=getTickCount(); printf("%s line %d lap %d: %9.3fus\n",fname,lineNum,lapNum,(tStop-lapStart)*1e6); lapNum++; lapStart=tStop;}
00150   ~FunctionTimer()
00151   {tStop=getTickCount(); printf("%s: %0.6fms\n",fname,(tStop-tStart)*1000.0);}
00152 };
